records.name: Kamadhoo Inn

descriptions.hotel: Kamadhoo Inn is located on Kamadhoo island, a truly picturesque local island of the Baa atoll with white, sandy beaches and turquoise lagoons. If you are looking for an unforgettable local island vacation and for discovering the real Maldives come visit us at Kamadhoo Inn and make some great barefoot memories. Maldives is our home and we want to share our home, its natural beauty and its unique atmosphere with you. Experience together with us and our team the real Maldives. We are Silvia from Italy and Naseef from Maldives and are very excited to welcome you. ***Property Policies*** Cancellation policy: 7 days before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the total price of the reservation. Check in from 14:00 to 21:00. Check out from 08:00 to 12:00 noon. Payment upon arrival by cash. Taxes not included, there are extra 10% Service Charge + 16% GST + 4$ per person per day Green Tax Breakfast included. No curfew. There will be no alcohol available in the local island and bikini wear is only permitted on the designated area (bikini beach) since Maldives is a Muslim country. We have 2 transfer options to/from Kamadhoo from/to Velena International Airport. Option 1 - Domestic Air Transfer: Return Transfer will be USD 320 (FLYME DOMESTIC AIRLINES) per person Domestic Air transfer: Route – Male’ International Airport to Dharavandhoo Domestic Airport Duration approximately: 20 to 30 minutes followed by a speed boat ride to KAMADHOO (20 min) Option 2 - Speed Boat: Return Transfer USD 120 per person Route - Male to Kamadhoo (approximately 2 hours) Please inform us with your international flight details in order to find the most suitable transfer option for you.
descriptions.direction: Located in Kamadhoo, Kamadhoo Inn is near the beach. Randheli Arrival Jetty is a notable landmark, and the area's natural beauty can be seen at Kihaadhuffaru Island Beach and Hanifaru Bay. Nelivaru Finolhu and Hurawalhi Beach are two other places to visit that come recommended.
descriptions.general: Experience an abundance of unparalleled facilities and features at Kamadhoo Inn. Maintain seamless communication using the complimentary Wi-Fi at hotel. Effortlessly arrange transportation to and from the airport using the hotel's airport transfer services. Obtaining passes for the town's top entertainments becomes effortless with hotel's tours.For extended visits or whenever required, the laundry service ensures your preferred travel garments remain fresh and accessible. During leisurely days and evenings, on-site amenities such as daily housekeeping enable you to fully enjoy your accommodation. Kindly note that smoking is prohibited in the hotel to ensure fresher air for all visitors.At Kamadhoo Inn, every guestroom is provided with convenient amenities and fittings to ensure a comfortable stay.Enhance your experience at hotel with the knowledge that certain rooms are equipped with linen service and air conditioning for your convenience. A few accommodations within Kamadhoo Inn offer unique design elements such as a balcony or terrace.In select rooms within the hotel, a refrigerator, bottled water, instant coffee, instant tea and mini bar is available to cater to your requirements when desired. It is worth noting that certain guest bathrooms feature a hair dryer and toiletries for your convenience. Begin your day carefree at Kamadhoo Inn, as complimentary breakfast is offered for your convenience.At the hotel, an assortment of easily accessible and delicious meal choices are available to satisfy your appetite whenever it strikes. At Kamadhoo Inn, they are committed to catering to your unique requirements. They offer a variety of meal choices, encompassing halal alternatives for those with special dietary preferences.At the hotel, discerning guests can also enjoy on-site culinary facilities like BBQ facilities tailored to their preferences. During your stay at hotel, an array of engaging activities and amenities guarantees a delightful experience. During your stay, don't forget to allocate some moments to experience the readily available shoreline.
descriptions.other: Kamadhoo has a beautiful bikini beach with crystal clear waters and white sandy beach. Kamadhoo has its own housereef with an amazing marine life. A few minutes by boat we can reach Hanifaru Bay, a UNESCO BIOSPHERE RESERVE. From April to May you have the chance to see a lot of Manta rays and with a bit of luck even whalesharks. Kamadhoo island is great to experience beautiful trips to nearby sandbanks, uninhabited islands and lots of wonderful coral reefs.
